Title: In middle school I asked whether the Red Sox or Redskins were the football team and everyone laughed...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: In middle school I asked whether the Red Sox or Redskins were the football team and everyone laughed at me. The teacher said 'It's not nice to make fun of autistic people'. I thought she was making an edgy joke but now I think she just thought I was actually autistic.
